channel.title: blogging on Matt's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Matt's Tech Blog

item.title: Up and running!
item.description: Finally! I launched my new blog about my hacking adventures in the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning. Following a recommendation on Andrej Karpathy’s blog I decided to use Jekyll and host it on Github. Thanks to Barry Clark’s post it took only a few minutes to setup.
